summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Swiss Botany Pueraria Mirifica Serum for Breast Enhancement – Natural Breast Firming & Lifting Cream for Women and Men Breast Enlargement| 1 ounce Review Date: 2016/02/28 Store: Swiss Botany Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Plump, Firming', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Brand': 'Swiss Botany', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'C2I_INV_B00HRGBAT0_R', 'UPC': '799441998808', 'Manufacturer': 'Swiss Botany'} Review Text: I recently started using it and it got a nice flowerish smell to it. i don't see any difference yet in my breasts and I've been using it for about a week already once in a morning and once before bed time. So far i think this is ok product because i can't say much .... Review Title: ok product! Used For a Week and NO results YET.... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vitamin C Antioxidant Lotion by Eva Naturals - 1.7 oz - Best Antioxidant Body, Anti Wrinkle Lotion for Free Radical Damage Prevention - Vitamin C Benefits Collagen, Wrinkle & Fine Line Prevention Review Date: 2016/06/03 Store: Eva Naturals Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Eva Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.39 x 2.01 x 1.3 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ENVCC2', 'UPC': '646437716956'} Review Text: ITS NOT BAD AT ALL.... ITS A NICE MOISTURIZING CREAM BY EVA NATURALS
IT IS EFFECTIVE AND GENTLE AND SOFT... IT IS GREAT FOR PEOPLE WHOEVER HAD SENSITIVE SKIN OR DRY SKIN (LIKE I DO)
IT HELPS TO SMOOTH AND MOISTURE IT!!!
IT GOT THIS SPECIFIC SMELL IN IT... ITS OK BUT NOT MY FAVORITE THO...
The combination of Vitamin C and other natural antioxidants helps heal damaged skin and create a healthy, youthful and radiant complexion.
AFTER APPLYING SEVERAL TYPES TO MY DRY SKIN /PATCHES IVE NOTICE THAT ITS ALOMST GONE!! THE SKIN LOOKS MORE YOUNG AND SMOOTH. I LIKE THAT EVA NATURALS GOT ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS IN IT.
I RECEIVED THIS PRODUCT AT DISCOUNTED PRICE FOR MY HONEST REVIEW. Review Title: PLEASE USE IT IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH DRY AND SENSITIVE SKIN!!!! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ERBA Hair Essence 4.05 fl.oz/120ml Protein Vitamin Minerals from Cereals - Cream Essence - Luxury Aluminum Containers Review Date: 2016/07/29 Store: Sarangsae Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.7 x 1.9 x 1.9 inches; 6.72 Ounces'} Review Text: This is a great nutritional supplement ERBA contains Protein, Vitamin and Minerals ingredients derived from Cereals for your damaged or dry hair.
All you need to do is After shampoo, apply appropriate amount evenly to damp or dry hair on damaged areas.... massage thru and let it air dry or with hairdryer. The hair feels so soft and very smooth. I love it. After using it for couple of weeks i see the change in my hair, the split end or dry hair after bleaching almost gone :) so excited !!! i really wanna see the results in like a month of use!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! THE SMELL OF IT IS HEAVENLY!!! i received this item at discounted price for my honest review. Review Title: THE SMELL IS HEAVENLY AND DOES THE JOB!!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: HBY8482; 50 Pics Solid Stretch Pony Elastics Ponytail Holders Review Date: 2016/10/10 Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '50', 'Unit Count': '50.0 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 3.7 x 1.2 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '636266790548'} Review Text: These are super Stretchy and made of great qualitY!!! i like that its perfect for my thick hair and this elastics are thin... they are not thick... BUT HOLDS a lot og hair!!! i highly recommend this and YES I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!
Thank you so much HBY for giving me to try your product , its amazing 1!!! I received those at discounted price Review Title: HIGH QUALITY ~!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sky Organics Fractionated Coconut Oil for Body & Face, 100% Pure to Condition, Soften & Smooth, 16 fl. Oz Review Date: 2016/10/10 Store: Sky Organics Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sky Organics', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '16.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 2.56 x 2.4 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '856045007289', 'Manufacturer': 'Sky Organics'} Review Text: I like to use coconut oil in many ways, Like for hair, skin , and cooking. This oil i use for hair .... like a mask before a hair wash. I absolutely love the way my hair look and feel after. Shiny , smooth and silky !!! highly recommend to do this mask for your hair if you have like a split end or dry damage hair.~ Review Title: great moisturizer for hair. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals an individual focused on natural and effective skincare and haircare products, showing a clear preference for items containing beneficial ingredients like Vitamin C and essential oils. Ratings indicate a tendency toward moderate satisfaction, often highlighting the importance of natural formulations, particularly for sensitive skin. Products aimed at enhancing moisture and addressing dryness are favored, with a consistent sentiment of seeking visible results over time.

Themes around product purpose suggest a strong inclination towards cosmetic and wellness solutions that improve appearance and health, particularly in relation to skin texture and hair condition. The individual seems to appreciate versatility in products, as evidenced by the multiple uses of items like coconut oil.

Quality is a recurring theme, with a preference for high-quality, effective products; however, the sentiment indicates some disappointment when results are not immediately apparent, particularly in skin enhancement products. Price sensitivity appears to lean towards seeking value in discounts and perceived performance.

Overall, the core preferences indicate a health-conscious consumer who prioritizes natural ingredients, quality, and multi-functionality while exhibiting a moderate level of patience for results, reflective of their approach to personal care and self-improvement.

target_interaction.text: DIDNT REALLY work on me,.... the product is ok... not the best one but may be it was working on someone else :(
